participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Emily is passionate about her work and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_1.background: I moved to the mountains to be closer to my mom and to enjoy skiing. i read sci fi space adventures with a passion. i like wide, open spaces. I just finished painting my nails. My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and driven, Jordan thrives in fast-paced environments and enjoys expressing himself through fashion and sports.
participant_2.background: I don't mind the weather as long as I can listen to VNV Nation. i am a night owl. i had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents. I'm a busy nurse but I love playing basketball on the weekends. i like to make clothes.

content.text: What are you up to today
Just got home from work, getting ready to relax.
It was pretty good, I'm always exhausted but that's to be expected as a nurse.
I bet! I'm a nurse too.
Oh cool! What kind of nursing do you do?
I work in a hospital, on a med-surg floor.
Oh nice! I work in a pediatric ER
It can be, but it can also be really stressful.
I bet! What's your favorite part of the job?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's awesome, I feel the same way.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to read, go hiking, and spend time with my pets.
Oh nice! I like to listen to music, play basketball, and make clothes.
